description: Part first floor rear extension (demolition of existing outbuilding)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) A100 (Rev. B) - Existing Site & Roof Plan, A101 - Existing Ground Floor Plan (Rev. B), A102 (Rev. A) - Existing First Floor Plan, A103 (Rev. A) - Existing Elevations, A200B - Proposed Block Plan A200 (Rev. B) - Proposed Site and Roof Plan, A202 (Rev. A) - Proposed First Floor Plan Notes, A203 - Proposed Ground Floor Plan Dims, A204 (Rev. A) - Proposed Elevations, Site Location Plan (unnumbered)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | Prior to commencement of the development, the existing single storey rear outbuilding shall be demolished.
Reason: To avoid overdevelopment of the curtilage, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Plan Document (2013).
